original_title: Confessions of a Teenage Peanut Butter Freak
overview: Sexual awakening of Billy, an inept teenager who undergoes a series of humiliating, but nevertheless arousing experiences. His peculiar traumatic experiences cause him to develop an insecurity about his ability to have a sexual relationship with a woman, as well as a fetish for peanut butter.
title: Confessions of a Teenage Peanut Butter Freak
